description: Angular component definition for a customizable horizontal divider used for section separation in the UI. The component supports optional color and margin customization and uses Angular-specific decorators and binding.

classes.name: DividerComponent
classes.description: A minimal, modern, horizontal divider component that supports custom color and margin options.

methods.name: hostClass
methods.description: Getter that returns the CSS class string based on the margin input.

methods.name: style
methods.description: Getter that returns an object containing inline styles, specifically the CSS variable for the divider color.
